alb_dns_name.description: Public DNS name of the Application Load Balancer.

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL to push images to.

acm_certificate_arn.description: ACM certificate ARN for HTTPS listener (required if enable_https=true).

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 recommended).

container_port.description: Container port exposed by the Flask/Gunicorn app.

enable_http_redirect_to_https.description: If enable_https=true, create an HTTP listener that redirects to HTTPS.

enable_https.description: Whether to create an HTTPS listener. Requires ACM certificate ARN.

enable_route53.description: Whether to create a Route53 alias record to the ALB.

health_check_path.description: ALB target group health check path. Ensure your app serves this path with 200.

image_uri.description: Full container image URI (e.g., <account>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com/repo:tag). If empty, uses the ECR repo created by this stack with tag 'latest'.

log_retention_in_days.description: CloudWatch log retention for ECS container logs.

platform_env.description: Value for PLATFORM environment variable passed to the container.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.

route53_record_name.description: DNS record name to create (e.g., app.example.com).

route53_zone_id.description: Route53 hosted zone ID (required if enable_route53=true).

task_memory.description: Fargate task memory (MiB). Must be compatible with CPU.
